Lets Play STOP GAME!!

This game is super easy to play , we just need a letter "We will make it with the Random Letter Generator" After we get the letter , we need to fill up all the gaps"Name,City..." with a word that the first letter should be the one give it from the generator.
  1. Press the button and get the letter
  2. Fill up the gaps"Name,City,Country"
  3. Be fast,the first one to fill up all the gaps needs to say stop!
  4. Then count your points"If the word that you used is not repeated you have 200,if not 100"
  5. You win?!So lets do it again until we make 10 words
  6. ENJOY MY FRIEND!BE FAST!
